rules_text:
Interlink with Sena, Ouroboros Ogre [i](You can have both creatures be your commanders. Melds with that creature.)[/i]
Vigilance, break
Lanz, Ouroboros Defender must be blocked if able.
[i]Topple[/i] - {T}, Remove a counter from you or a creature you control: Target creature gets +1/+0 for each creature blocking it and gains trample until end of turn.
